mapper.select:
SELECT A.NOTI_ID , A.BOARD_ID , A.CATE_ID , A.UP_NOTI_ID , A.NOTI_KIND , A.NOTI_TITLE , A.NOTI_CONTS , A.NOTI_URL , A.NOTI_OPN_DIV , A.FB_REG_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.STAT_CD , B.USER_ID , B.USER_NM , A.NOTI_READ_CNT , A.NOTI_OK_CNT , A.NOTI_NG_CNT , A.WRITE_IP , A.NOTI_BGN_DTTM , A.NOTI_END_DTTM , A.SCRAP_CNT , A.NOTI_OPN_CNT , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DTTM , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DTTM , A.REF , A.RESTEP , A.RELEVEL , B.USER_FILE_NM , B.USER_FILE_PATH FROM NOTI_INFO A, PSN_USER B WHERE A.NOTI_ID = #{notiId} AND A.REG_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001'
AND B.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT NOTI_ID , APND_FILE_SEQ , APND_FILE_TP , APND_FILE_SZ , APND_FILE_ORGN , APND_FILE_NM , APND_FILE_PATH , APND_FILE_PRE_PATH , APND_FILE_PRE_NM , DEL_YN , REG_ID , REG_DTTM , UPD_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = #{notiId} ORDER BY APND_FILE_SEQ
SELECT A.NOTI_ID , B.USER_FILE_NM , B.USER_FILE_PATH FROM USER_SCRAP_INFO A ,PSN_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTI_INFO SET NOTI_OK_CNT = NOTI_OK_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTI_ID = #{notiId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE NOTI_INFO SET NOTI_NG_CNT = NOTI_NG_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTI_ID = #{notiId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE NOTI_INFO SET SCRAP_CNT = SCRAP_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTI_ID = #{notiId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT C.NOTI_ID ,A.APND_FILE_SEQ ,A.APND_FILE_ORGN ,A.APND_FILE_NM ,A.APND_FILE_PATH ,C.NOTI_TITLE FROM NOTI_APND_FILE A, NOTI_INFO C WHERE A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.CATE_ID = #{cateId} AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND A.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) ORDER BY NOTI_OK_CNT DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT NOTI_OPN_SEQ , NOTI_ID , UP_NOTI_OPN_SEQ , OPN_CONTS , USER_ID , USER_NM , WRITE_IP , REF , RELEVEL , RESTEP , DEL_YN , REG_ID , REG_DTTM , UPD_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM NOTI_OPN WHERE NOTI_ID = #{notiId} AND NOTI_OPN_SEQ = #{notiOpnSeq} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.NOTI_ID ,A.NOTI_OPN_SEQ ,A.UP_NOTI_OPN_SEQ ,A.OPN_CONTS ,A.USER_ID ,A.USER_NM ,A.REF ,A.RELEVEL ,A.RESTEP ,CAST( DATE_FORMAT( A.UPD_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AS CHAR(19) ) UPD_DTTM ,B.USER_FILE_NM ,B.USER_FILE_PATH FROM NOTI_OPN A ,PSN_USER B WHERE A.NOTI_ID = #{notiId} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY A.REF DESC, A.RESTEP ASC LIMIT #{toLimit}

SELECT COUNT(A.NOTI_ID) CNT FROM NOTI_INFO A ,NOTI_APND_FILE B ,NOTI_EVAL_INFO C ,PSN_USER D WHERE A.NOTI_ID = B.NOTI_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND B.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID) AND A.NOTI_ID = C.NOTI_ID AND C.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.NOTI_EVAL_DIV = '003' AND A.REG_ID = D.USER_ID
AND C.REG_DTTM BETWEEN (NOW() - INTERVAL #{period} DAY) AND NOW()

SELECT COUNT(A.NOTI_ID) CNT FROM NOTI_INFO A ,NOTI_APND_FILE B ,PSN_USER D WHERE A.REG_ID = D.USER_ID AND A.NOTI_ID = B.NOTI_ID AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BOARD_ID = 'LALALA001' AND B.APND_FILE_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(APND_FILE_SEQ) FROM NOTI_APND_FILE WHERE NOTI_ID = A.NOTI_ID)
AND A.NOTI_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
